title.narrative: ADVOCACY & COMMUNICATION

description.narrative: Issues related to unrealized rights of children, boys and girls, are regularly communicated and measurable and positive changes in public policies, behaviors and social norms are made for children, which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Cross-cutting actions of knowledge production and management and advocacy are based on verifiable data, inducing positive behavioral change
